text: Vasilisa the Beautiful () is a 1940 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Alexander Rou.КАРО.Арт и Киностудия Горького объявили о старте ретроспективы Александра РоуВасилиса Прекрасная It stars Georgy Millyar, Sergey Stolyarov, and Lev Potyomkin. == Actors == * Georgy Millyar as the father and as Baba-Yaga * Sergey Stolyarov as Ivan, the youngest son * Lev Potyomkin as Agaphon, the middle son * Nikita Kondratiev, as Anton the oldest son * Valentina Sorogozhskaya as Vasilisa the Beautiful ==Related pages== * Vasilissa (child martyr) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1940 movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou
title: Vasilisa the Beautiful (1940 movie)
